figure_1: Intervention procedure of the single-session EmpkinS-EKSpression Reappraisal Training against depression was examined in this feasibility study in healthy individuals.
figure_2: Consolidated Standards of Reporting Trials (CONSORT) flow diagram of participants in the feasibility study investigating the single-session EmpkinS-EKSpression Reappraisal Training against depression in healthy individuals from screening to analysis.
figure_3: Subjective depressed and positive mood ratings over the course of the single-session EmpkinS-EKSpression Reappraisal Training against depression were examined in this feasibility study in healthy individuals. Regression lines represent loess curves.
